scshm.database.server.SenStoreServer.SessionLock Class Reference

Detailed Description

Session lock for nested calls protected by a global lock.

The owner can obtain a lock using 'with' statements, or enter and exit critical sections explicitly. The lock will be released only upon leaving the top level critical section.

def scshm.database.server.SenStoreServer.SessionLock.enter (   self  ) 

Enters a critical section.

Acquires the global lock if called at the top level critical section.

def scshm.database.server.SenStoreServer.SessionLock.exit (   self  ) 

Exits a critical section.

Releases the global lock if called at the top level critical section.
